casebody.data:
FROMBERG SILK COMPANY, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. OSTROW & ZUCKERMAN, Inc., Morris Ostrow, and Maurice L. Zuckerman, Defendants-Appellants. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 7, 1929. No. 111. Bondy & Schloss, of New York City (Eugene L. Bondy, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants, Emil Weitzner, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
